Detailed Description

template<class IndexType>
class tsl::detail_ordered_hash::bucket_entry< IndexType >

Each bucket entry stores an index which is the index in m_values corresponding to the bucket's value and a hash (which may be truncated to 32 bits depending on IndexType) corresponding to the hash of the value.

The size of IndexType limits the size of the hash table to std::numeric_limits<IndexType>::max() - 1 elements (-1 due to a reserved value used to mark a bucket as empty).
